entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Longueuil
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:02 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.4°C

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
